title: Analysis of Factors Influencing Intention to Use Large-Scale E-Learning: Simulation Education Based on the UTAUT2 Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and corporate training experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid education combining VR simulation with mobile learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will apply the seven core variables of the UTAUT2 model (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence, facilitating conditions, hedonic motivation, habit, and personal innovativeness) to e-learning adoption intention analysis
Learners will empirically evaluate e-learning adoption influencing factors (financial cost, technological innovativeness, etc.) in smartphone-based VR simulation environments
Learners will propose organizational e-learning implementation strategies through project-based assessment and analyze differences in team members' adoption intentions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
